1.3.name: wordpress/theatre-troupe
1.3.description:
TheatreTroupe is a Wordpress plugin for small performing groups for listing shows and associated actors. As your group admin, you can easily enter and display your previous and upcoming shows/performances anywhere on your pages sidebar.

The plugin was developed for the Estonian improvisation comedy troupe "Improgrupp Jaa!" and is available for free under the GPL2 licence. Support-, feature requests and bug reports are welcome to andoroots+dev@gmail.com or directly to github.
